channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2024070213
item.description:
Report E-2024070213

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-22
  • City: WEST MEMPHIS
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 9400
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank. During the course of the delivery, the connection between the hose adaptor and storage tank became compromised. This caused approximately 100 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. A portion of the spilled diesel fuel was able to impact a nearby storm drain. Hepaco Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
